accessPolicy.description: The default access policy of this DMP segment.

account.description: The sponsored account urn that this DMP segment belongs to. Refer here to search for sponsored accounts that can be used.

id.description: The id of this DMP segment.

destinations.description: The destinations and various metadata that the content of this segment will be onboarded to. Currently, the only accepted value is LINKEDIN.

name.description: The name of this DMP segment.

sourcePlatform.description: The source platform from where users profiles are being imported.

type.description: The content type of the profiles being imported into this DMP segment. Possible values are USER, COMPANY, or LIST_UPLOAD.
